Articles.Content:
American industry shall pay for damaging the mighty German industrial machine. A dirty bomb should do the trick.

The Horton Brothers slaved away to make this a reality. Watch as Walter and Reimar Hortons' dreams come to life.

She handles like a beauty. Press 1 to toggle the bomb bay.

This is the best WWII bomber concept ever designed. Expect some more WWII era stuff.
